title: Linux rar Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the rar command in Linux with practical examples. Learn how to install the rar package, create and extract rar archives, and manage them with advanced options.

meta.title: Linux rar Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the rar command in Linux with practical examples. Learn how to install the rar package, create and extract rar archives, and manage them with advanced options.
meta.keywords: Linux, rar, compression, archiving, Ubuntu, file management
